name: ground
description: Grounded claims for code. An MCP server that prevents AI hallucination in code analysis by requiring verification before claims.

tools.name: ground_compare
tools.description: Compare two files for similarity percentage

tools.name: ground_count_uses
tools.description: Count how many times a symbol is used (distinguishes definitions vs actual uses)

tools.name: ground_check_connections
tools.description: Check if a module is connected to the dependency graph

tools.name: ground_check_environment
tools.description: Detect Workers/Node.js API leakage across module boundaries

tools.name: ground_find_duplicate_functions
tools.description: Find copied functions across files with configurable minimum lines

tools.name: ground_find_dead_exports
tools.description: Find exports that are never imported elsewhere

tools.name: ground_find_drift
tools.description: Find design system violations (hardcoded colors, spacing, etc.)

tools.name: ground_suggest_pattern
tools.description: Get context-aware token suggestions with reasoning

tools.name: ground_mine_patterns
tools.description: Discover implicit patterns that could become design tokens

tools.name: ground_analyze
tools.description: Batch analysis: duplicates + orphans + dead exports

tools.name: ground_claim_duplicate
tools.description: Claim files are duplicates (requires ground_compare first)

tools.name: ground_claim_dead_code
tools.description: Claim code is dead (requires ground_count_uses first)

tools.name: ground_claim_orphan
tools.description: Claim module is orphaned (requires ground_check_connections first)
